testsuite.name: login.LoginPasswordFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginPasswordAlphanumeric Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "NkcwZ" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Alphanumeric characters are allowed in the password text field TC_loginPasswordAlphanumeric Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginPasswordMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "Fnu" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Password must be greater than 5 characters error message is displayed TC_loginPasswordMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginPasswordEyeIconEnable Testcase execution Started em>"This method verifies entered Password is displayed in encrypted format by default in Login screen" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "JAakva" in the Password field Performed click action on Eye icon field The password is displayed by default in encrypted format TC_loginPasswordEyeIconEnable Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginPasswordEyeIconDisable Testcase execution Started "This method verifies entered Password is displayed in Plain text format on disabling View icon in Login screen" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "iIZhKu" in the Password field Performed click action on Eye icon field Password is displayed in plain text in the password field TC_loginPasswordEyeIconDisable Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginPasswordPlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies password field Placeholder text" Password* Password field placeholder text is not displayed TC_loginPasswordPlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginPasswordSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Password text field Performed click action on Login button field Required error message is displayed TC_loginPasswordSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginPasswordEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Password in the Login screen" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Required error message is displayed TC_loginPasswordEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginPasswordSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "_${&=&" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Special characters are allowed in the password text field TC_loginPasswordSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginPasswordMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "xMtRQSPzFDcEUrkH" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Password must be less than 16 characters error message is displayed TC_loginPasswordMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed
